      <p>Hi Kevin,<br>=
Thanks for the pointer.=C2=A0=C2=A0 Short of getting that change merged int=
o the code base, I'm wondering if there's anything I can do in term=
s of perhaps writing a custom runner to replace Suite, or perhaps a custom =
run listener.=C2=A0=C2=A0 On the surface, it doesn't seem like it shoul=
d be too difficult to get the same set of events fired for a suite as would=
 be the case with running multiple independent test classes.=C2=A0=C2=A0 If=
 you had any pointers as to where to start digging that would be great.<br>=
